about_the_game:
Mortified is multiplayer horror co-op game playing 1-8 players

You are a private investigator who must intervene on several macabre places or atrocious murders have occurred but everything will not go as planned , You are facing an entity whose existence you would never have discovered your goal is to make a ritual that will allow the demonic creature to disappear from this world! And above all, never turn back!

Alone or with friends ?


  • 1-8 player online co-op
    Take control of up to 8 investigators in this unique online co-op experience where you have to work together to leave! and flee the demonic creature so as not to end up in its bowels

  • Single player mode
    For players who are brave enough only. In this mode you can count only on yourself!

Hell is waiting for you !

There are several map at your disposal such as the amblematic Manor and many more!

Your goal?
find yourself locked up without electricity and only with a flashlight and your courage
collect all the objects to do the ritual that will allow the creature to disappear forever!

Difficulty
  • Basic Mode
    You have a flashlight that never runs out! the creature is not there yet when you arrive at the location

  • Hard Mode
    You have a flashlight battery which means you need to find batteries in addition to the ritual items! the monster is already awake and waiting for you on the spot!

Multiplayer Features
Use our in-game positional voice chat. Bring friends or find other players using the server browser.

Warning
This game contains flashing lights that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions. Player discretion is advised.

content_descriptors.notes: In Mortified you may be confronted with a large amount of blood as well as some bone , cracking sounds which could disturb some audiences.
